creator: McAfee LLC
descriptionHtml:
McAfee Mobile Security is the ultimate mobile security tool. Get mobile phone security, private WiFi and mobile antivirus protection for your device with privacy protection from McAfee.

McAfee Mobile Security arms you with everything you need to stay protected. Protect yourself with Smart Security, Privacy Protection, McAfee’s antivirus and spyware protection and keep your private data away from prying eyes.

Protection and privacy are provided by a powerful security engine from McAfee® Global Threat Intelligence. Use a virus remover, spyware detector, WiFi Scanner and mobile security features to defend against phishing, risky apps and WiFi threats.

Protect your phone with Find Phone features, device optimization with storage cleaner, memory booster, battery booster, and data usage tracking from McAfee.

Download the Mobile Security App today and defend yourself with the latest free antivirus app, spyware removal, and WiFi security for your mobile device.

**McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection includes McAfee Mobile Security Standard in their subscriptions**

Mobile Security Free includes:

ANTI THEFT & MOBILE SECURITY
▪ Anti Theft with Device Lock Security and Thief Cam: Locks your device after 3 failed passcode entries and takes a snapshot of the person using it
▪ Anti Theft Uninstall Protection: Keep a thief from uninstalling the Mobile Security app on your device
▪ Spyware Removal: Stop phishing and prevent access to your personal information
▪ Find Phone: Find your phone with a map location service, sound a remote alarm, or get step-by-step help for tracking it
▪ Mobile security app with remote management from the web portal
▪ App Privacy Check: Know which apps may put your personal data privacy at risk

FREE ANTIVIRUS APP SCANNER
▪ Antivirus Widget:* Stay up to date on your antivirus security status and fix issues with one tap
▪ Virus cleaner and removal: Scans for malicious code from files, SD card, apps and internet downloads.

SAFE WIFI ACCESS + WIFI SCANNER
▪ Secure WiFi – Maintain an encrypted connection online
▪ WiFi Protection – Keep your personal data, online activities, IP addresses and physical locations private from prying eyes
▪ Free Wi-Fi scanner analyzes networks for security.
▪ WiFi alerts you when you connect to unsecured hotspots.

PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION
▪ Battery Booster: Extended battery life
▪ Memory Booster: Free up memory (RAM) of background apps
▪ Phone Cleaner: Remove unwanted files and apps
▪ Phone Data Tracker: Set data limits and monitor usage

BACKUP CONTACTS
▪ Backup contacts automatically through the McAfee Cloud and recover contacts from your lost or stolen device.

Mobile Security Standard includes all of the above, with:

SAFE WEB
▪ Safe Web secure browsing utility prevents online threats.
▪ Safe Web alerts you when browsing malicious websites, protects you from phishing or ARP Spoofing and helps to keep your personal data, photos and videos private.

DEVICE SECURITY
▪ Secure Lock: securely lock apps with sensitive content
▪ Guest Mode*: Control which apps your guest can see on your device
▪ Media Backup: Save and restore your media files

Mobile Security Plus includes everything with:

Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN***
▪ Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN protection to defend against unsecured public Wi-Fi hotspots.
▪ IP Proxy and no geo-restrictions for secure browsing.
▪ Maintain web security and access geographically restricted content.
▪ A secure Wi-Fi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public Wi-Fi.
▪ PLUS package comes with all standard and free features.

AD TRACKER BLOCKING***
▪ Stop ad trackers and annoying targeted ads

***Wi-Fi Guard VPN and Ad Tracker Blocking is not available in McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection.


*Android 5.1.1/6.0 users must grant accessibility to enable Widget, App Lock, & Guest Mode
**Thief-Cam and SIM-card lock features are not available on Android 10 (Q) devices
MMS uses the Device Administrator permission & Accessibility services
descriptionShort: Stay connected at home. Safe & secure browsing with a VPN and phone security.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Due to changes in the Android operating system, we have removed two device lock options under the Anti-theft: Auto-lock and Airplane mode lock. Bug fixes and performance optimizations to improve your overall experience.

McAfee Mobile Security is the ultimate mobile security tool. Secure your device with privacy protection from McAfee.

McAfee Mobile Security arms you with everything you need to stay protected. The security app helps you protect yourself with Smart Security, Privacy Protection, McAfee’s antivirus and spyware protection and keep your private data away from prying eyes.

Get phone security from a powerful security engine provided by McAfee® Global Threat Intelligence. Use a spyware detector, WiFi Scanner, virus removal and mobile security features to defend against phishing, risky apps and WiFi threats.

Storage cleaner, Find Phone features, device optimization, memory booster, battery booster, and data usage tracking all help to enhance your mobile device.

Get a free antivirus app, spyware removal, and WiFi security for your mobile device to defend yourself with McAfee Mobile Security.

**McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection includes McAfee Mobile Security Standard in their subscriptions**

Mobile Security Free includes:

ANTI THEFT & MOBILE SECURITY
▪ Anti Theft with Device Lock Security and Thief Cam: Locks your device after 3 failed passcode entries and takes a snapshot of the person using it
▪ Anti Theft Uninstall Protection: Keep a thief from uninstalling the Mobile Security app on your device
▪ Spyware Removal: Stop phishing and prevent access to your personal information
▪ Find Phone: Find your phone with a map location service, sound a remote alarm, or get step-by-step help for tracking it
▪ Mobile security app with remote management from the web portal
▪ App Privacy Check: Know which apps may put your personal data privacy at risk

FREE ANTIVIRUS APP SCANNER
▪ Antivirus Widget:* Stay up to date on your antivirus security status and fix issues with one tap
▪ Virus cleaner and removal: Scans for malicious code from files, SD card, apps and internet downloads.

SAFE WIFI ACCESS + WIFI SCANNER
▪ Secure WiFi – Maintain an encrypted connection online
▪ WiFi Protection – Keep your personal data, online activities, IP addresses and physical locations private from prying eyes
▪ Free Wi-Fi scanner analyzes networks for security.
▪ WiFi alerts you when you connect to unsecured hotspots.

PERFORMANCE OPTIMIZATION
▪ Battery Booster: Extended battery life
▪ Memory Booster: Free up memory (RAM) of background apps
▪ Phone Cleaner: Remove unwanted files and apps
▪ Phone Data Tracker: Set data limits and monitor usage

BACKUP CONTACTS
▪ Backup contacts automatically through the McAfee Cloud and recover contacts from your lost or stolen device.

Mobile Security Standard includes all of the above, with:

SAFE WEB
▪ Safe Web secure browsing utility prevents online threats.
▪ Safe Web alerts you when browsing malicious websites, protects you from phishing or ARP Spoofing and helps to keep your personal data, photos and videos private.

DEVICE SECURITY
▪ Secure Lock: securely lock apps with sensitive content
▪ Guest Mode*: Control which apps your guest can see on your device
▪ Media Backup: Save and restore your media files

Mobile Security Plus includes everything with:

Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN***
▪ Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN protection to defend against unsecured public Wi-Fi hotspots.
▪ IP Proxy and no geo-restrictions for secure browsing.
▪ Maintain web security and access geographically restricted content.
▪ A secure Wi-Fi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public Wi-Fi.
▪ PLUS package comes with all standard and free features.

AD TRACKER BLOCKING***
▪ Stop ad trackers and annoying targeted ads

***Wi-Fi Guard VPN and Ad Tracker Blocking is not available in McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection.


*Android 5.1.1/6.0 users must grant accessibility to enable Widget, App Lock, & Guest Mode
**Thief-Cam and SIM-card lock features are not available on Android 10 (Q) devices
MMS uses the Device Administrator permission & Accessibility services
descriptionShort: Safe Wi-Fi Guard VPN. Free Antivirus Scan, Phone Cleaner & App Lock Protection

appDetails.developerAddress:
Corporate Headquarters
2821 Mission College Blvd.
Santa Clara, CA 95054
USA
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• To keep your privacy secure, we’ve redesigned the App Privacy Check 🕵️ to let you know which apps may put your personal data privacy at risk. Tap Scan to get started.
• Bug fixes and performance optimizations to improve your overall experience.

If you love the app, please leave us a review and rate us 5 stars ⭐!! (5 Stars = Good) 💪 Together with McAfee. We can make your experience better. 😁

container.value:

creator: McAfee LLC
descriptionHtml:
McAfee Mobile Security is the ultimate mobile security tool. Get secure VPN WiFi access, mobile phone security, and mobile antivirus protection for your device with privacy protection from McAfee.

Your phone is kept safe with protection and privacy provided by a powerful security engine from McAfee® Global Threat Intelligence. Virus remover, spyware detector, WiFi Scanner and mobile security features defend your device against phishing, risky apps and WiFi threats.

Protect your phone with phone location tracking, storage cleaner, memory booster, battery booster, and data usage tracking from McAfee.

McAfee Mobile Security protects you with the latest in antivirus, spyware removal, and WiFi security.

**McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection includes McAfee Mobile Security Standard in their subscriptions**

Mobile Security Free includes:

ANTI THEFT
▪ Anti Theft with Device Lock Security and Thief Cam: Locks your device after 3 failed passcode entries and takes a snapshot of the person using it
▪ Anti Theft Uninstall Protection: Keep a thief from uninstalling the Mobile Security app on your device

MOBILE SECURITY
▪ Spyware Removal: Stop phishing and prevent access to your personal information
▪ Find My Phone: Find your phone with a map location service, sound a remote alarm, or get step-by-step help for tracking it
▪ Mobile security app with remote management from the web portal
▪ App Privacy Guard: Know which apps may put your personal data privacy at risk

SAFE WIFI ACCESS + WIFI SCANNER
▪ Internet Security – Maintain an encrypted connection online
▪ WiFi Protection – Keep your personal data, online activities, IP addresses and physical locations private from prying eyes
▪ Free Wi-Fi scanner analyzes networks for security.
▪ WiFi alerts you when you connect to unsecured hotspots.

PERFORMANCE OPTIMISATION
▪ Battery Booster: Extended battery life
▪ Memory Booster: Free up memory (RAM) of background apps
▪ Memory Cleaner: Remove unwanted files and apps
▪ Data Usage App: Set data limits and monitor usage

BACKUP CONTACTS
▪ Backup contacts automatically through the McAfee Cloud and recover contacts from your lost or stolen device.


FREE ANTIVIRUS APP SCANNER
▪ Antivirus Widget:* Stay up to date on your antivirus security status and fix issues with one tap
▪ Virus remover and cleaner: Scans for malicious code from files, SD card, apps and internet downloads.

Mobile Security Standard includes all of the above, with:

SAFE WEB
▪ Safe Web secure browsing utility prevents online threats.
▪ Safe Web alerts you when browsing malicious websites, protects you from phishing or ARP Spoofing and helps to keep your personal data, photos and videos private.

DEVICE SECURITY
▪ Secure Lock: securely lock apps with sensitive content
▪ Guest Mode*: Control which apps your guest can see on your device
▪ Media Backup: Save and restore your media files

Mobile Security Plus includes everything with:

Unlimited Wi-Fi Guard VPN***
▪ Secure VPN protection against unsecured public Wi-Fi hotspots.
▪ IP Proxy and no geo-restrictions for secure browsing.
▪ Maintain web security and access geographically restricted content.
▪ Secure Wi-Fi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public Wi-Fi.
▪ PLUS package comes with all standard and free features.

AD TRACKER BLOCKING***
▪ Stop ad trackers and annoying targeted ads

*Android 5.1.1/6.0 users must grant accessibility to enable Widget, App Lock, & Guest Mode
**Thief-Cam and SIM-card lock features are not available on Android 10 (Q) devices
***Wi-Fi Guard VPN and Ad Tracker Blocking is not available in McAfee LiveSafe and McAfee Total Protection.
MMS uses the Device Administrator permission & Accessibility services

In order to provide you with the best possible experience, McAfee Mobile Security will require Android 7 and above. You are encouraged to update your device to the latest version to receive timely security updates, maximum protection, and enhanced performance.

creator: McAfee LLC
descriptionHtml:
McAfee Security helps protect against malware threats and identity breaches with advanced identity and privacy protection, and our award-winning antivirus cleaner. Stay safer online with VPN, safe browsing, identity protection, antivirus cleaner & more.

McAfee Security’s all-in-one online security solution protects your data and privacy with Antivirus cleaner and scanner, Dark Web Monitoring, Safe Browsing, Secure VPN and proxy, and WiFi Scan.

Secure up to five devices across compatible smartphones, tablets, PCs, and Macs — our award-winning antivirus cleaner is only available on PCs and Android devices.

Protect your digital self, your security, and privacy with virus cleaner, spyware removal, identity protection and remediation, VPN, and WiFi scanner.

SECURE VPN
Keep your personal data and location private anywhere you go with bank-grade WiFi encryption, making your data unreadable to prying eyes and boost your online security and privacy. Give your WiFi connection the extra privacy and security you need with Secure VPN proxy and services. Secure VPN helps private info stay private with bank-grade VPN encryption, so you can hide your location with McAfee Security’s VPN and proxy.

▪ Secure VPN protection defends against unsecured public WiFi hotspots
▪ IP Proxy means secure browsing with WiFi VPN
▪ VPN provides a secure WiFi hotspot to browse safely on unsecured public WiFi
▪ Keep your WiFi protected with Secure VPN – Keep your data, online activities, IP addresses, and physical locations private when using WiFi

ANTIVIRUS - VIRUS SCANNER AND CLEANER
Protect your personal info and compatible devices against viruses with antivirus cleaner and scanner. McAfee's antivirus security scan and virus cleaner protect against viruses, malware and more.

▪ Antivirus cleaner and security scanner
▪ Continuous virus protection and antivirus cleaning
▪ Antivirus cleaner and virus removal
▪ Check for malicious viruses from files, apps, and downloads with antivirus cleaner and scan
▪ Detect and destroy security and privacy threats with antivirus virus cleaner protection


DARK WEB MONITORING - IDENTITY PROTECTION
Monitor the most critical aspects of your life online, from emails to phone numbers and more for the greatest online security. Dark web monitoring checks dark web feeds for stolen info related to your email privacy while providing you with identity remediation tools for the latest in identity and privacy protection.

▪ Dark web monitoring for identity security and privacy
▪ Identity privacy, protection, and remediation
▪ Monitor up to 10 email addresses

SAFE BROWSING
Sidestep risky sites, links, and files when browsing online, protecting your devices and the personal info on your devices. You can browse safely with your favorite browser — we’ll automatically block malicious websites for you.

▪ Safe Browsing helps you sidestep risky websites, links, and files
▪ Safe Browsing prevents online threats and viruses while using your favorite browser
▪ Safe Browsing alerts you when browsing malicious websites; it protects you from phishing; it helps keep your data private


WI-FI SCAN
Get timely alerts when attempting to connect to an unsafe network so you can choose a different network or turn on Secure VPN.

▪ Maintain a safe WiFi connection online
▪ WiFi Scan analyzes networks for security
▪ WiFi Scan alerts you when you connect to unsecured hotspots

Not all features are available for all devices or locations. See System Requirements for additional information.

descriptionHtml:
NEU: McAfee Scam-Schutz (beta)
Unsere KI scannt Textnachrichten vor dem Öffnen und warnt bei Entdeckung gefährlicher Links.

Erleben Sie mit McAfee Security einen umfassenden Online-Schutz und erhöhen Sie Ihre mobile Sicherheit in Ihrem Browser. Erhalten Sie 7 Tage lang mobile Sicherheit mit kostenlosem Schutz, einschließlich unseren Funktionen wie etwa der Antivirensoftware, dem Secure VPN und Tipps für mehr Datenschutz.

Unsere Datenschutzlösung schützt Ihre Privatsphäre, Identität und persönliche Daten und Geräte vor Viren und Spyware mit dem Anti-Spyware. Mit unserer preisgekrönten Antivirensoftware, dem Secure VPN, Identitätsschutz und WLAN-Scan steht Ihre Sicherheit im Mittelpunkt, wenn Sie online sind und Ihren Browser benutzen.

Setzen Sie auf Virenschutz beim Surfen im Web und erhalten Sie Warnmeldungen bei Sicherheitsverletzungen. Unser Secure VPN stellt automatisch eine Verbindung her, damit Sie überall sicher sind. Schützen Sie mit dem Identitätsschutz Ihre E-Mail-Adressen, Bankkarten, Ausweise und Passnummern vor Malware-Angriffen und vor Spyware.

Mobile Sicherheit für gleichzeitig bis zu 5 Geräte, darunter Smartphones, Tablets, PCs und Macs. Scannen Sie WLAN-Netzwerke, beheben Sie Datenverletzungen oder aktivieren Sie den Virenschutz, um Ihre Privatsphäre mit unseren Sicherheitstipps optimal zu schützen.


MCAFEE SICHERHEITSFUNKTIONEN:

ANTIVIRUS-SOFTWARE UND VIRENSCANNER*
▪Anti-Spyware und Malware-Schutz mit unseren preisgekrönten Antivirenfunktionen und dem Virenreiniger
▪ Hackerschutz für Ihre persönlichen Dateien, Apps und Downloads
▪ Unser Virenscanner erkennt und entfernt alle Sicherheits- und Datenschutzbedrohungen

UNBEGRENZTES SICHERES VPN**
▪ Unser privates VPN-Proxy bietet WLAN-Verschlüsselung auf Bankniveau, damit Sie und Ihre Familie geschützt sind
▪ Secure VPN schützt vor ungesicherten WLAN-Hotspots und öffentlichen Netzwerken, die über Proxy-Server laufen
▪ VPN-Proxy ermöglicht ein sicheres Surferlebnis, wo auch immer Sie sich befinden
▪ Datenschutz: Verbinden Sie sich mit verschiedenen Ländern, um Ihren Standort und Ihre IP-Adresse zu ändern

IDENTITÄTSSCHUTZ**
▪ Persönliche Daten können rund um die Uhr gescannt und auf Sicherheitsverstöße überprüft werden
▪ Sicherheitswarnungen und unsere Tipps sorgen dafür, dass Ihre Daten schnell gegen Viren geschützt werden
▪ Sichern und überwachen Sie bis zu 10 E-Mail-Adressen, ID-Nummern, Reisepassnummern und mehr

SICHERES SURFEN UND WLAN-SCANNER
▪ Blockieren Sie Malware-Angriffe von Websites automatisch, damit Sie mit Ihrem Browser sicher surfen können
▪ Sicherer Netzwerkzugang: Web-Schutz, der Sie vor riskanten Websites und Links warnt
▪ WLAN & Hotspots: Scannen Sie jedes Netzwerk auf seine Sicherheit
▪ Der WLAN-Scanner analysiert Netzwerke und sorgt für eine sicherere Online-Verbindung

SCHUTZINDEX
▪ Mit unserem branchenführenden Schutzindex wird es ein Leichtes sein, Ihre Identität zu schützen
▪ Privatsphäre wahren und mit dem Schutzindex überwachte persönliche Daten prüfen
▪ Bleiben Sie sicher, indem Sie vorgeschlagene Maßnahmen ergreifen, z. B. zur Behebung von Sicherheitsverletzungen

Mit McAfee Security ganz einfach online sicher bleiben. Noch heute herunterladen und Privatsphäre schützen.

creator: McAfee LLC
descriptionHtml:
NOUVEAU : protection anti-arnaque McAfee
Notre IA analyse vos textos avant de les ouvrir et vous alerte si un lien est à risque.
Si vous cherchez un moyen efficace de protéger vos données et vos dispositifs en ligne, nous avons une offre spéciale rien que pour vous ! En tant que nouvel utilisateur, vous bénéficierez d’une protection gratuite de 30 jours grâce à McAfee Security, une solution tout-en-un qui inclut un antivirus, un nettoyeur de virus, un navigateur privé, un VPN illimité et un scanner Wi-Fi.
McAfee Security vous permet de protéger jusqu’à cinq appareils avec un antivirus, y compris des smartphones, tablettes, ordinateurs Windows et Mac. Notre programme de nettoyage antivirus primé est disponible uniquement pour les ordinateurs Windows et les appareils Android. De plus, vous pouvez l’état de votre sécurité en ligne avec notre score de protection qui se fonde sur la sécurité de vos informations personnelles et qui est associé à des suggestions pour l’améliorer, comme l’activation d’un VPN.
Le VPN sécurisé et illimité de McAfee Security préserve la confidentialité de vos données personnelles et de votre localisation grâce à un cryptage Wi-Fi de haute sécurité. Vos données ne pourront être déchiffrées par personne, sauf vous, ce qui améliorera votre sécurité et votre confidentialité en ligne. Notre VPN sécurisé vous protège aussi contre les hotspots Wi-Fi non protégés en mettant à votre disposition un hotspot Wi-Fi protégé pour un navigateur privé sur un réseau Wi-Fi public.
Notre nettoyeur de virus et notre scanner antivirus assurent une protection permanente contre les virus et les logiciels malveillants. De plus, notre fonction de protection de l’identité vous permet de contrôler vos e-mails et numéros de téléphone pour garantir une sécurité numérique ultime. Vous pouvez également naviguer en toute sécurité avec notre service de navigateur privé qui bloque automatiquement les sites Web malveillants et vous avertit lorsque vous naviguez sur des sites dangereux.
Enfin, notre scanner Wi-Fi vous alertera si vous vous connectez à un réseau non protégé afin que vous puissiez choisir une alternative ou activer le VPN sécurisé.
Pour résumer, McAfee Security vous fait bénéficier d’une protection en ligne tout-en-un pour vos données, vos dispositifs et votre confidentialité contre les programmes malveillants, les usurpations d’identité et bien plus encore. Vérifiez la configuration système requise pour vous assurer que nos fonctionnalités seront disponibles sur tous vos dispositifs et dans tous les lieux où vous les utilisez. N’attendez plus et protégez-vous en ligne avec McAfee Security !

Politique de confidentialité :
Vous pouvez consulter notre politique de confidentialité et nos Conditions générales à l’adresse https://www.mcafee.com/fr-fr/consumer-support/policy/legal.html
